portfolio.rationale: This socially responsible fund tracks the FTSE4Good US Select Index, which excludes fossil fuel companies and is a low-cost option for socially conscious investors.
This ETF provides broad diversification across the US stock market and has a low expense ratio.
This ETF tracks the MSCI EAFE Index, which covers developed markets outside the US and Canada, adding international diversification.
This ETF provides exposure to emerging markets, which can bring growth potential to the portfolio.
This allocation provides a stable source of income and helps reduce overall portfolio risk.
This allocation provides liquidity and a low-risk option for parking excess funds
